attributes.action:
Producers of plastic 
 that cannot be recycled should be fined by the ton
attributes.background:
This might make producers of plastic goods be more environmentally aware of the damage their goods are doing.
This would hopefully make all manufacturers change and accept the damage they are doing

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you would like single-use plastics banned then you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231235
